name: Blood Moon Phaser
details:
Vintage-style phaser pedalIf classic 1970s phaser tones make your heart beat faster, brace yourself for a sheer heart attack! Blood Moon Phaser resurrects the toothsome phaser sounds of yesteryear and transfuses them with a range of modern features such as top-mounted input/output and true bypass. Infuse your tone with the haunting howls and sacchariferous sweeps convoked by Blood Moon Phaser´s vintage four-stage filter - and get ready to rock out from dusk till dawn!
Vintage-style phaser pedal
Classic four-stage filter design
True bypass and top-mounted I/O
http://www.tcelectronic.com/de/blood-moon-phaser/
